meanings.definition: The act of using money to buy goods or services.
meanings.sent1: Her spending at the store was carefully planned.
meanings.sent2: I need to track my spending to stay within budget.
meanings.sent3: His spending on snacks is out of control!
meanings.sent4: Her spending was like a river flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The reckless spending left him in debt.

meanings.definition: The amount of money that is spent.
meanings.sent1: The total spending for the project exceeded expectations.
meanings.sent2: His monthly spending on groceries is reasonable.
meanings.sent3: The extravagant spending on decorations was unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: Her spending was a drop in the bucket compared to his.
meanings.sent5: The wise spending saved him from financial troubles.

meanings.definition: The act of using time or energy on a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: Her spending of time on hobbies brings her joy.
meanings.sent2: Balancing work and leisure spending is important.
meanings.sent3: His spending of energy on video games is excessive.
meanings.sent4: Her spending of time was like investing in herself.
meanings.sent5: The intense spending of energy left him exhausted.
